newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures end down after late drop.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures end down after late drop.

text.p: June 30 - September S&P 500 stock index futures ended lower after abruptly changing course late in the session following a second foray above the 900.00 level. Futures spent most of the day recovering from a morning sell-off on strong U.S. economic data, pushed to new highs after bond futures closed, then fell again on pressure related to the end of second quarter.
